member.name: P:pbs.BO.PM.My.Resources.Resources.DB_Scripts_PM
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <Root> <!--CONTRACT--> <DBO name="pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}" type="U"> <Install> IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id=OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.[pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}]')) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}]( [LINE_NO] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] [varchar](15) [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:pbs.BO.PM.My.Resources.Resources.DB_Scripts_PM_SQLite
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <Root> <!--CONTRACT--> <DBO name="pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}" type="U"> <Install> CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pbs_PM_CONTRACT_{XXX}( [LINE_NO] [int] NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, [CONTRACT_NO] [nvarchar](25) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_DATE] [int] NOT NULL, [CONTRACTOR] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT] [varchar](15) NOT NULL, [CONSTRUCTION_UNIT_NAME] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL, [CONTRACT_TYPE] [varcha [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:pbs.BO.PM.My.Resources.Resources.SCHEMALIST_PM
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <PBS_SCHEMA>
<row table="CTR" Description="Contract" module="PM"/> <row table="WBS" Description="Work Breakdown Structure" module="PM"/> <row table="LEDGER" Description="Ledger" module="PM"/> <row table="PROGRESS" Description="Progress" module="PM"/>
</PBS_SCHEMA>.
